remarks: Value of isomorphism H for a lattice ` K ` when ` X .<_ W ` . (Contributed by NM, 4-Mar-2014.)
statement:
dihvalb.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
dihvalb.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
dihvalb.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dihvalb.i $e |- I = ( ( DIsoH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dihvalb.d $e |- D = ( ( DIsoB ` K ) ` W ) $.
dihvalb $p |- ( ( ( K e. V /\ W e. H ) /\ ( X e. B /\ X .<_ W ) ) -> ( I ` X ) = ( D ` X ) ) $.
